/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -W -Wall -Werror=return-type -Werror=address -Werror=sequence-point -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wmissing-declarations -Wundef -Winit-self -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wsign-promo -fdiagnostics-show-option -pthread -march=i686 -fomit-frame-pointer -msse -msse2 -mfpmath=sse -ffunction-sections -O3 -DNDEBUG  -DNDEBUG   -shared -Wl,-soname,libopencv_video.so.2.4 -o ../../lib/libopencv_video.so.2.4.2 CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/motempl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/bgfg_gaussmix2.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/video_init.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/bgfg_gaussmix.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/kalman.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/camshift.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/lkpyramid.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/precomp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_video.dir/src/optflowgf.cpp.o ../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.2 ../../lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.2 -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt ../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.2 -lz -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/home/jacques/Workspace/current/M1/BDM/bdm-wavebook-2012/Reconnaissance_Faciale/OpenCV-2.4.2/release/lib:
